data.description: Modules providing a rich OO-based Milter API
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Mail::Milter is an API designed to live on top of Sendmail::Milter
    or Sendmail::PMilter (not Net::Milter, which is an implementation of
    the MTA side of the milter network protocol). It is a rich
    object-oriented module suite meant to make creation of milter-based
    mail filters much easier.

    It lives outside the Sendmail::* projects, as it works with either
    of them. In the future, it may also be possible to use Mail::Milter
    filter objects inside a Perl-language MTA without Sendmail::Milter
    installed at all.
